column4: ok jel, sorry I will never ever split up questions into 2 lines again. But the question was "does anyone know a place where I could have some (not much) free private ftp space?" followed by "I like ubuntu 1 but I believe it doesn't support ftp" and it appears everyone reacts only to the latter
the memory of this IRC channel is literally 20 lines XD
I think there are some free shell providers on the net which provide you some small space.
